title: Spiral Mountain
description: The first area in any run. In 100% we are going to collect 6 honeycombs around the mountain before we head up. In any% we are going straight up the mountain. The only notable trick to mention is Bottles skip which can be accomplished in one of two methods

general.name: Bottles Skip (backflip method)
general.description: This method was used intially to skip the bottles cutscene at the top of SM

general.name: Bottles Skip (new method)
general.description: A newer, faster method of accomplishing the skip.
